description:
'''David Ljubenović''' ({{lang-sr-Cyrl|Давид Љубеновић}}, born on 9 May 1995), better known as '''Devito''', is a [[Serbia]]n rapper from [[Kragujevac]]. Initially a photographer and  a music video director, he made his recording debut in 2018. Known for wearing [[Balaclava (clothing)|balaclavas]] in public, Devito has never shown his face publicly.

After a series of standalone singles, Devito released his debut album, entitled ''[[Plava krv]]'', in May 2023 to commercial success.
